title: 我的世界 启动不了！
author: mtb3029990
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mtb3029990 于 2012-7-29 11:40 编辑 

我安JAVA了 也设名字了 我的是集成网卡 运行游戏出现：{:10_516:}
Mods loaded: 1
ModLoader 1.2.5
      Bad video card drivers!

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

replies.author: cwf32
replies.txt_content: 略翻译是说你的显卡驱动不支持。或者说是不给力
